mapper.insert: insert into tb_consultation (gmt_create, gmt_modify, user_id, contents, state, remind_date, remind_contents) values (now(), now(), #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contents,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remindDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remindContents,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, user_id AS userId, contents, state, remind_date AS remindDate, remind_contents AS remindContents FROM tb_consultation ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;
